attributes.action: cause to be presented to Parliament a Self-Denying Ordinance the provisions of which shall render all Members of the current House of Commons ineligible to stand as parliamentary candidates at the next General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present House of Commons has been brought into disrepute by the behaviour of many of its Members.  The proposed introduction of untainted Members is an attempt to restore to the House of Commons the integrity and legitimacy that the electorate has the right to expect.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
